name: Outcome-based Roadmap Template
description:
A template for those who want to simply represent their outcome-based product strategy visually.

Built with AutoLayout and Autoflow, the components resize automatically, the arrows follow each component automatically, and one can use shift+click to draw new arrows as need be.

Also, built-in components so you don't have to alt+click everything (although we all just alt+click anyways, right?)
